name: google-maps-draw
description: Fully featured drawing toolbox control for Google Maps API

scripts.dev: npm run lint && watchify lib/index.js --debug -s google-maps-draw -t babelify -t lessify -t hbsfy --outfile dist/google-maps-draw.js
scripts.dist: npm run lint && browserify lib/index.js -s google-maps-draw -t babelify -t lessify -t hbsfy --outfile dist/google-maps-draw.js
